PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-05762024-05-24HC
ActControlled Drugs and Substances Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Precursor Control Regulations (Emerging Fentanyl Precursors)
PrecisRegulations Amending the PRECURSOR CONTROL REGULATIONS (EMERGING FENTANYL PRECURSORS) in order to expand the existing listing of 4-piperidone and its salts to include its derivatives and analogues.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0100 Publication Date: 2024-06-05
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the PRECURSOR CONTROL REGULATIONS (EMERGING FENTANYL PRECURSORS) in order to expand the existing listing of 4-piperidone and its salts to include its derivatives and analogues.
